info.author: Andreas Stocker
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
=================
xhostplus.videojs
=================

An video product for Plone 3 and 4. It provides a video content type, which
stores WebM, H.264 and OGG Theora files (either in the ZODB or as external URL).

This product uses VideoJS, falling back to Flowplayer, for playback.

Translations
============

This product comes with following languages:

* English
* German

Further translations are welcome.

- Questions and comments to support@xhostplus.at

Changelog
=========

1.2.3 (2014-08-30)
------------------

- replaced slot body by slot main in viewvideo, added text/plain to allowable_content_types
  [eambrosch]


1.2.2 (2013-07-01)
------------------

- Added support for youtu.be links
  [andreas_stocker]

1.2.1 (2012-11-09)
------------------

- Uploading only one webm file is now working
  [andreas_stocker]

1.2.0 (2011-10-11)
------------------

- Fixed fullscreen mode in VideoJS
  [andreas_stocker]
- Support for adding FLV files
  [andreas_stocker]

1.1.0 (2011-10-09)
------------------

- Added support for youtube videos
  [andreas_stocker]

1.0.0 (2010-03-27)
------------------

- Initial version (not public)
  [andreas_stocker]
info.keywords: plone zope videojs html5 flash multimedia
info.name: xhostplus.videojs
info.summary: A javascript videoplayer with flash fallback
